video.title: Braxton Family Values
video.synopsis: Songstress sisters Toni, Traci, Towanda, Trina and Tamar Braxton open up about their lives and their relationships -- and reveal a few surprises.

episodes.synopsis: Toni takes her sisters on a trip to Italy. Tamar can't join because she's promoting her single in New York.
episodes.title: Ciao, Braxtons!

episodes.synopsis: The sisters plan some sightseeing and bonding time when they visit Toni on her movie set in Canada, but things don't go as planned.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Braxton Drama

episodes.synopsis: Tamar's music career is taking off, but conflict among the sisters forces them all into a conversation with a familiar friend of the family.
episodes.title: The Tamar-vention

episodes.synopsis: Tamar is tired of feeling attacked by her sisters, Toni makes new demands, and Traci is getting ready to bolt.
episodes.title: Papa Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: Toni considers a major professional change, Traci hosts a Women's Cancer Walk, and Trina pushes a family clothing store idea.
episodes.title: Traci's Bustin' Out!

episodes.synopsis: The sisters tangle with relatives at their dad's birthday party, then rush to Atlanta when Evelyn is hospitalized. Toni meets with Babyface.
episodes.title: Party in the DMV

episodes.synopsis: Trina shocks Toni while attending a charity event, and the sisters become outraged when their store plans are altered.
episodes.title: A Diva's Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: Trina contemplates a big move, and the sisters get caught up competing against each other in an intense cook-off.
episodes.title: What's Cookin' in the Oven?

episodes.synopsis: Tamar goes for her first ultrasound, while Evelyn holds a funeral for a beloved family member. Also, Traci has a surprise for the family.
episodes.title: Hello Baby, Goodbye Dog

episodes.synopsis: Toni asks Trina to perform her songs at a concert, but Trina struggles during rehearsals. Evelyn moves to L.A. and makes Tamar take a parenting class.
episodes.title: Sister Act

episodes.synopsis: Trina and Traci have major solo gigs, but Tamar and Toni have harsh criticism for Trina. Towanda sets up Tamar with a new assistant.
episodes.title: Go Hard or Go Home

episodes.synopsis: Evelyn is ready to take the next step in her love life and dips into the dating pool. Trina makes a business decision that gets a dramatic response.
episodes.title: Braxton Leading Lady

episodes.synopsis: Drama unfolds at Tamar's shower while Toni makes a decision about working with Babyface.
episodes.title: Rumor Has It

episodes.synopsis: Traci and Trina face questions about their marriages at the Essence Festival. Toni works on her single with Babyface. Tamar promotes her new album.
episodes.title: A Very Public Affair

episodes.synopsis: Traci questions her husband about his illegitimate son and confronts her sisters about gossiping. Toni and Tamar prepare for tours.
episodes.title: I Don't Have No Baby

episodes.synopsis: Toni is under pressure as she preps for her first tour in five years. While sick, Tamar rehearses for her album tour. Traci gets her own radio show.
episodes.title: Back to Braxton Business

episodes.synopsis: Toni fights nerves to make a triumphant return to the stage. Trina struggles with her performance in Toni's show. Tamar shoots a lavish music video.
episodes.title: Tour De Divas

episodes.synopsis: The sisters return home from Toni's tour. Towanda preps her birthday party and clashes with Tamar. Trina works with Gabe on a new business, Bar Chix.
episodes.title: Birthday-Zilla

episodes.synopsis: Toni and Babyface rehearse for their tour. Towanda poses nude, fires Trina and throws her mega 40th birthday bash.
episodes.title: Birthday Bare-All

episodes.synopsis: After months of tension, Tamar and Towanda go head-to-head while Toni tries to mediate. Toni and Babyface shoot the video for "Hurt You."
episodes.title: #Wack #Family

episodes.synopsis: Tamar hosts Toni's birthday dinner, while Evelyn battles a stalker. Toni pushes the sisters too far in a ballroom dance class.
episodes.title: They Threw a Shoe at You?!?

episodes.synopsis: Toni sings at the Breeders Cup. Tamar invites her sisters to join her on tour. Trina throws Bar Chix's launch party. Traci records for her album.
episodes.title: Chix In a Row

episodes.synopsis: Trina joins Tamar on the road, but Tamar is upset that the other sisters aren't there. Traci and Toni get pulled over by the cops.
episodes.title: Shade Anonymous

episodes.synopsis: Trina, Traci and Towanda go on a game show to try to win $1 million. Evelyn is arrested for carrying a Taser. Tamar does PR at a radio station.
episodes.title: Who Wants to Be a Braxton?

episodes.synopsis: Tamar is honored at the Soul Train Awards and earns Grammy noms. Trina is back in the studio. Tamar makes her sisters sign a contract to do an album.
episodes.title: Award Show Shade!

episodes.synopsis: Tamar attends the Grammy Awards with three nominations. Vince throws an after party using Trina's Bar Chix service.
episodes.title: It's All Good!
